short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate, share, and launch A/B tests from your browser. No code required.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Let your website optimize itself ðŸª„

Use our fine-tuned model to generate and launch A/B tests on your website. 

Once your test reaches statistical significance, Keak uses the data collected to fine-tune your model and automatically generate and launch your next A/B test. 

Keak is more than just another A/B testing tool, itâ€™s a way to let your website optimize itself 24/7 by learning by your past tests and continuously launching new tests! 

Our extension also doubles as a web editor where you can make edits to your page and share a screenshot with someone in one click.
